data.eml:eml: Redescription of Conostigmusalbovarius Dodd, 1915 (Hymenoptera, Megaspilidae), a metallic ceraphronoid, with the first description of males

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Trietsch, Carolyn, Deans, Andrew R., Miko, Istvan (2015): Redescription of Conostigmusalbovarius Dodd, 1915 (Hymenoptera, Megaspilidae), a metallic ceraphronoid, with the first description of males. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 46: 137-150, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.46.5534, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.46.5534
